articles.title: Multiple new species of 'living fossil' fish found hiding in plain sight after more than 150 years - Phys.org
articles.description: The modern coelacanth is a famous "living fossil," long thought to have died out, but first fished out of deep waters in the Indian Ocean in 1938. Since then, dozens of examples have been found, but their fossil history is patchy.

articles.title: Juno spacecraft finds auroral 'footprints' of Jupiter's moon Callisto for 1st time - Space
articles.description: Yes, even Jupiter's moons produce auroras.
articles.content: In a landmark observation by a team of international researchers, NASA's Juno spacecraft has, for the first time, clearly detected the auroras of Jupiter's moon Callisto. This discovery completes the… [+2754 chars]
